author: chianca
title: The Catalyst School | LATAM
description: In LATAM, there's a language barrier for local communities to get educated about Catalyst since English is not commonly spoken in the region
solution: The Catalyst School | LATAM will be a place to onboard local communities and enhance the impact of Catalyst in Latin America.
experience: Veteran advisors and proposal mentors, education professionals, very active Catalyst community members since early Funds and more.
